Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightPlayerRelated

Class LightChat

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.lightPlayerRelated.LightChat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Differentiable, Observed, Serializable
public class LightChat extends Object implements Differentiable, Observed
This class represents the chat in the light model. It contains only the message that this user is allowed to see.
